description:
7digital MP3 Music app delights users by allowing them to discover, purchase and download high-quality, DRM-free MP3 music from a catalog of over 14 millions songs directly to the HP TouchPad.  Enjoy browsing current charts and previewing the latest tracks to find exciting new music and artists. 

The 7digital MP3 Music app for the TouchPad features:

•	Over 14 million songs 
•	30 second preview of all songs
•	Browse top album and  track charts, new releases and genres
•	Quality 320kbps MP3s
•	Download high audio quality, DRM-free tracks and albums directly to your HP TouchPad
